thread.title: New Apple Download Servers Will Be Available in China
thread.title_full: New Apple Download Servers Will Be Available in China - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: New Apple Download Servers Will Be Available in China
text: After publishing an advisory on their support website for Chinese customers, Apple has now made it clearer of what further steps they will take to make sure that XcodeGhost is the last malware of its kind to hit the App Store. Phill Schiller Apple's SVP of Worldwide Marketing declared today during a phone interview with Sina, a Chinese online media company, ... Â»
